short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alfred is the all-in-one threat detection and email validation service trusted by the world's most respected brands.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Email Verifier Plus by Alfred is an extension designed exclusively for alfred.email users to validate the deliverability and threat of individual email addresses without having to use the application website.
